title: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis

tosdr.case: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis
tosdr.tldr: You are and remain subject to the policies of those third parties where applicable. By using the Website, the Search Encrypt Application and the Services, you expressly relieve Search Encrypt from any and all liability (direct or indirect) arising from your use of any share functionality or third-party site or resource accessed from the Website, the Search Encrypt Application or the Services. We encourage you to ask questions before you disclose your personal information to anyone. We reserve the right to change, modify or delete links to third party websites without notice.
